io.smudgr.app.controller.Controllable

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AppStart.bind(Controllable c)
      Register a control to bind to a MIDI input on start

    • Uses of Controllable in io.smudgr.app.controller

      Subinterfaces of Controllable in io.smudgr.app.controller 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AppControl
      Interface for defining controllable app behavior and/or actions.

    • Uses of Controllable in io.smudgr.app.controller.controls

      Classes in io.smudgr.app.controller.controls that implement Controllable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CurrentSourceControl
      Change the current Source within the current SourceSet
      class  RecordGIFControl
      Control for starting and stopping recording to a GIF image.
      class  SaveFrameControl
      Capture and save the currently rendered PixelFrame.
      class  SaveProjectControl
      Save the current project to the existing project location.
      class  SourceLibraryControl
      Change the current SourceSet within the current SourceLibrary

    • Uses of Controllable in io.smudgr.engine.param

      Classes in io.smudgr.engine.param that implement Controllable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlendParameter
      The BlendParameter class is used to parameterize specifically different Blender functions.
      class  BooleanParameter
      The BooleanParameter class is a Parameter implementation for interacting with a boolean (on/off) variable.
      class  NumberParameter
      The NumberParameter class is a Parameter implementation for interacting with a numeric variable.
      class  Parameter
      The abstract Parameter class defines the generic behavior for interacting with an arbitrarily typed value.
      class  UnivariateParameter
      The UnivariateParameter class is a Parameter implementation for switching between UnivariateFunction functions that take a single numeric variable, and return a single numeric value.

    • Uses of Controllable in io.smudgr.extensions.automate.controls

      Subinterfaces of Controllable in io.smudgr.extensions.automate.controls 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AutomatorControl
      An AutomatorControl implements behavior for automatically interacting with any given Parameter.
      Classes in io.smudgr.extensions.automate.controls that implement Controllable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BeatAutomator
      The BeatAutomator synchronizes with the current Project.getBPM() to adjust a NumberParameter value in sync with the beat.
      class  DownsampleAutomator
      The DownsampleAutomator will downsample the current Rack according to the current application FPS, to try an achieve the Controller.TARGET_FPS.
      class  EasingAutomator
      The EasingAutomator attempts to smoothen sharp value changes by easing into a base state after user interaction.
      class  StepAutomator
      The StepAutomator simply changes a NumberParameter by it's NumberParameter.getStep() every tick.

    • Uses of Controllable in io.smudgr.extensions.midi.messages

      This method is called with the bound Controllable when a MIDI message corresponding to this strategy is received
